message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it provides. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $8800.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I was thinking more along the lines of $9150. Can we meet in the middle at that price?
Considering the value and my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $8950.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'd be willing to meet you at $9100. What do you think?
Considering the value and my financial limits, I would like to counteroffer at $8900.
I'm not quite ready to give up, Bob. I'd be willing to go as low as $9125. Can we meet at that price?
Considering the value and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $8950.
